summary:
•	11 years’ experience as a senior SAP business analyst with extensive experience across SCM operations processes and SAP modules ( WM, MM, PP, QM )
•	5 years’ experience of leading internal projects and enhancements of Warehouse management and Materials management.
•	Industry expertise: consumer electronics manufacturing, healthcare medical devices

projects.description:
- Project manager
- Deployed customized vendor consignment (VC) process to Datalogic plants to minimize company’s stock value and optimize storage. Business requirement was to deploy only one harmonized process globally. For compliacted process with a lot of legal and fiscal requirements, SAP team was able to deliver a user friendly process with a lot of outstanding features. The process is fully automatized, efficient with full material visibility and traceability.

Project Go-live : Datalogic Vietnam- HCM ; Datalogic Slovakia- Trnava; Datalogic ADC US- Eugene, Oregon.
projects.title: Datalogic Vendor consignment- global project

projects.description: Establish a Service Repair Center at the Vietnam Factory to repair products sold to Vietnamese customers, and to repair OBF/DOA products shipped to customers from the Vietnamese factory throughout South East Asia, China, Hong Kong, Macau, Taiwan, Korea, and Japan. OBF/DOA is intended to be used to create the RMA to send a replacement product.
projects.title: Vietnam domestic sales and service repair project.

projects.description:
During this project, we developped many enhancements based on business requirement to support and improve Purchasing activities. Enhancements covering MM & WM
- Source List Mass Upload tool for purchasing users.
- Vendor Consignment Enhancement
- PO sent by Generic mail box
- Inbound delivery & GR Enhancement in Terminals
....
projects.title: Purchasing enhancement- Global project

projects.description:
-	SLED (self-life expiration date)management in WH : define a new storage type and WM strategies to manage materials by self-life expiration date .
-	Goods receipt with serial numbers in ITSM applications
-	WM Transfer Order consolidation for materials which are picked from the same storage types.
-	Extend Storage sections setup for different materials group division 
-	Enhancement of packing optimization in ITSM applications for Radio Frequency Terminals. 
-	Enhancement and process to manage li-ion battery storage and shipping in compliance with IATA rules.
projects.title: Logistics improvement enhancements- Global project

projects.description:
-	Warehouse Management full functionality deployment for raw materials warehouse, finished goods warehouse, production lines.
-	Production planning and warehouse management integration
-	Quality management for receiving materials from suppliers.
projects.title: Warehouse management and Quality management implementation for Vietnam plant

projects.description:
Project SAP implementation for new business unit : Plastic manufacturing within limited plan and budget: 
- Jabil Vietnam bought a plastic molding factory and started producing plastic components in-house. Based on gathered business requirements, defined processes of inventory/warehouse management and manufacturing process. Leaded integration testing, data loading, transition plan, cut-over and supported golive.
projects.title: SAP implementation for new business unit (Plastic manufacturing)

projects.description:
Optimize and simplify warehouse structure and utilizing existing storage types and material master settings. Simplify finished goods stock management process.
Golive in 2016: Datalogic Vietnam, Datalogic Slovakia, Datalogic MSP- Italy, Datalogic Teramo- Italy.
projects.title: One Storage location-WM integration (global project)

projects.description:
-	Module WM , integration with MM, SD, PP
-	We developed ITSM aplications deployed the solution in Datalogic Radio Frequency Terminals products (mobile devices ) for Datalogic plants worldwide. The applications help warehouses to operate to high standards of performance by being more effective, accurate and efficient.
-Applications  Menu included :
Transfer order picking and putaway confirmation
WM & MM transfers
WM & MM inventory count
Packing delivery - using 2D bar codes, multiple packers can pack one delivery; "Pick & Pack" 1 step process, possibility to unpack / repack Handling Units (HUs), enter weight in one step/ change dimensions of HU, print HU labels directly from packing application
Update Bill of Lading to Outbound Delivery ; Post Goods Issue ; Create billing
Goods Receipt - based on Purchase Orders, Scheduling Agreements and Inbound/Outbound deliveries  for external vendors & intercompanies.
projects.title: ITS Mobile for Warehouse Management

educations.schoolName: University of Economics Ho Chi Minh city

headline: SAP Business Analyst at Terumo BCT
